briefTitle: Long-Term Safety Study of TA-7284 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of TA-7284 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of TA-7284 as monotherapy or combination therapy with other oral anti-hyperglycaemic agent in Japanese patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus on 52 weeks oral administration.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety and Tolerability Assessed by Adverse Events, Hypoglycemic Events
